Description: Blue-green glazed composition hemispherical bowl with small circular foot, wide ledge rim surrounding shallow interior, moulded figure of a couchant lion on rim, glaze much decayed.
Curator's comments: Published: H. Coutts, Gold of the Pharaohs, Edinburgh 1988, pp. 92-93 [68/D]. Petrie, Tanis I, 45 Brissaud and Zivie-Coche - Tanis 1987-1997, (1998). p.130, 175 [30b].
